name: Dyirbal

sentences: bayi ŋuma baŋgul yaɽaŋgu guniɲu
The man is searching for the father
bayi bayimbam baŋgul gubimbuluŋgu banȷan
The doctor is following the caterpillar
bayi bargan baŋgul midindu banȷan
The possum is following the wallaby
bayi ŋuma baŋgul ɲalŋgaŋgu bilmban
The boy is pushing the father
bayi biɲȷiriɲ baŋgul ɲalŋgaŋgu dimbaɲu
The boy is carrying the lizzard
bayi yiriɲȷila baŋgul yaɽaŋgu dimbaɲu
The man is carrying the dragonfly
bayi biɲȷiriɲ baŋgul gubimbulugu ŋunȷaɲu
The doctor is blaming the lizzard
bayi bayimbam baŋgul midindu ŋaȷin
The possum is ignoring the caterpillar
bayi yiriɲȷila baŋgul gubimbulugu buɽan
The doctor is looking at the dragonfly
bayi biɲȷiriɲ baŋgul yaɽaŋgu banȷan
The man is following the lizzard
bayi bargan baŋgul ɲalŋgaŋgu ŋunȷaɲu
The boy is blaming the wallaby

bayi yaɽa baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu wura-ŋgu guniɲu
The little boy is searching for the man
bayi ɲalŋga wura baŋgul yaɽa-ŋgu guli-ŋgu guniɲu
The strong man is searching for the little boy
bayi yaɽa baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu guli-ŋgu guniɲu
The strong boy is searching for the man
bayi midin muguru baŋgul gubimbulu-gu ŋaȷin
The doctor is ignoring the quiet possum
bayi midin baŋgul gubimbulu-gu bambun-du ŋaȷin
The healthy doctor is ignoring the possum
bayi midin ȷagi baŋgul gubimbulu-gu biŋgun-du buɽan
The tired doctor is looking at the big possum
bayi gubimbulu baŋgul midin-du wura-ŋgu buɽan
The little possum is looking at the doctor
bayi midin muguru baŋgul biɲȷiriɲ-ȷu guli-ŋgu dimbaɲu
The strong lizzard is carrying the quiet possum
bayi ŋuma baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu buɽan
The boy is looking at the father
bayi ɲalŋga baŋgul ŋuma-ngu buɽan
The father is looking at the boy
balan yabu baŋgun ɲalŋga-ngu ŋunȷaɲu
The girl is blaming the mother
balan ɲalŋga baŋgun yabu-ŋgu ŋunȷaɲu
The mother is blaming the girl
balan mugunanȷa baŋgun yabu-ŋgu ŋunȷaɲu
The mother is blaming the aunt
balan duŋan baŋgun waymin-du ŋunȷaɲu
The mother-in-law is blaming the stinging tree
balan malayigara baŋgun bundiɲ-ȷu ŋunȷaɲu
The grasshopper is blaming the scorpion
bala yila baŋgu garan-du dimbaɲu
The smoke is carrying the feather
bala ȷuga baŋgu gurugu-gu dimbaɲu
The booze is carrying the sugar
bala gurugu baŋgu diban-du dimbaɲu
The stone is carrying the booze
bala garan baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu buɽan
The boy is looking at the smoke
bala garan baŋgun yabu-ŋgu buɽan
The mother is looking at the smoke
balan ɲalŋga baŋgun mugunanȷa-gu dimbaɲu
The aunt is carrying the girl
bayi yaɽa baŋgun ɲalŋga-gu buɽan
The girl is looking at the man
bayi biɲȷiriɲ baŋgul ŋuma-gu buɽa-n
The father is looking at lizzard
bayi biɲȷiriɲ baŋgul ŋuma-gu ɲalŋga-buɽa-l-nay-muŋa-gu dimba-ɲu
The father that is always looking at the boy is carrying the lizzard
bayi ɲalŋga baŋgul ŋuma-gu biɲȷiriɲ-buɽa-l-nay-muŋa-gu dimba-ɲu
The father that is always looking at the lizzard is carrying the boy
bayi ɲalŋga baŋgun yabu-ŋgu ȷuga-dimba-nay-muŋa-gu buɽa-n
The mother that is always carrying the sugar is looking at the boy
bayi ɲalŋga garan-ŋaȷi-l-nay-muŋa baŋgun yabu-ŋgu guni-ɲu
The mother is searching for the boy that is always ignoring the smoke
balan bima ɲalŋga-guni-nay-muŋa baŋgun yabu-ŋgu ŋaȷi-n
The mother is ignoring the death adder that is always searching for the boy
balan bima baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu guni-y-muŋa-gu buɽa-n
The boy that is always being searched for is looking at the death adder
balan bima baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu bilmba-l-muŋa-gu buɽa-n
The boy that is always being pushed is looking at the death adder
balan baŋgay dimba-y-muŋa baŋgul midin-du guni-ɲu
The possum is searching for the spear that is always being carried
bayi midin baŋgay-dimba-nay-muŋa baŋgul ŋuma-gu guni-ɲu
The father is searching for the possum that is always carrying the spear
balan bima baŋgun yabu-ŋgu ŋaȷi-l-muŋa-gu bilmba-n
The mother that is always being ignored is pushing the death adder.
bala ȷuga baŋgul gubimbulu-gu biŋgun ŋunȷa-ɲu
The tired doctor is blaming the sugar
bayi gubimbulu baŋgu ȷuga-ŋgu biŋgun-man
The sugar is making the doctor tired
bayi gubimbulu baŋgun baŋgay-ŋgu mundu-man
The spear is making the doctor offended
balan bundiɲ ȷagun baŋgun yabu-ŋgu banȷa-n
The mother is following the sleeping grasshopper
balan yabu baŋgun bundiɲ-ȷu ȷagun-man
The grasshopper is making the mother asleep
balan yabu bambun baŋgu ȷuga-ŋgu ȷami-man
The sugar is making the healthy mother fat
balan baŋgay baŋgul yaɽa-ŋgu waɽu-man
The man is making the spear bent
bayi yaɽa baŋgu muŋga-ŋgu biŋgun-man
The noise is making the man tired
balan yabu baŋgul ɲalŋga-ŋgu mundu-man
The boy is making the mother offended
bayi yaɽa baŋgu muŋga-ŋgu ȷagun-man
The noise is making the man asleep
bayi yaɽa ŋunȷaymuŋa baŋgu gurugugu biŋgunman.
Booze is making the man that is always being blamed tired.
balan yabu bimabanȷalŋaymuŋa baŋgul yaɽaŋgu guliŋgu ŋunȷaɲu.
The strong man is blaming the mother that is always following death adders.
balan waymin bambun baŋgu ȷugaŋgu ȷamiman.
Sugar is making the healthy mother-in-law fat.
bala yila wura baŋgul bargandu biŋgundu guniɲu.
The tired wallaby is searching for the little feather.
balan malayigara baŋgu garandu biŋgunman.
The smoke is making the scorpion tired.
bala gurugu baŋgul ŋumaŋgu munduŋgu dimbaɲu.
The offended father is carrying the booze.
bayi midin baŋgun bimaŋgu malayigaraguninaymuŋagu banȷan.
The death adder that is always searching for scorpions is following the possum.
bayi gubimbulu biŋgun baŋgu gurugugu ȷagunman.
Booze is making the tired doctor fall asleep.
bala garan baŋgul biɲȷiriɲȷu banȷan.
The lizard is following the smoke.
balan duŋan baŋgul yiriɲȷilagu guniɲu.
The dragonfly is searching for the stinging tree.
bala ȷuga baŋgun yabuŋgu ŋaȷilmuŋagu dimbaɲu.
The mother that is always being ignored is carrying the sugar.
bala diban ȷagiɲ baŋgul gubimbulugu ȷamiŋgu bilmban.
The fat doctor is pushing the big stone.
bala garan baŋgun waymindu dibanbilmbalŋaymuŋagu buɽan.
The mother-in-law that is always pushing stones is looking at the smoke.
balan baŋgay waɽu baŋgun bundiɲȷu ȷagiɲȷu guniɲu.
The big grasshopper is searching for the bent spear.
bayi biɲȷiriɲ biŋgun baŋgul ɲalŋgaŋgu mugurugu buɽan.
The quiet boy is looking at the tired lizard.
bayi ŋuma guli baŋgul yaɽaŋgu banȷalmuŋagu munduman.
The man that is always being followed is offending the strong father.
balan ɲalŋga baŋgul ŋumaŋgu guniymuŋagu bambunman.
The father that is always being searched for is making the girl healthy
bala diban bilmbalmuŋa baŋgun biɲȷiriɲȷu guniɲu.
The lizard is searching for the stone that is always being pushed.
bayi bargan baŋgul yaɽaŋgu gubimbuluŋunȷanaymuŋagu banȷan.
The man that is always blaming doctors is following the wallaby.
bayi yiriɲȷila baŋgul bargandu wuraŋgu buɽan.
The little wallaby is looking at the dragonfly.
bala yila baŋgun mugunanȷagu banȷalmuŋagu waɽuman.
The aunt that is always being followed is making the feather bent.
bala muŋga baŋgul midindu ȷagundu ŋaȷin.
The sleeping possum is ignoring the noise.
bayi yaɽa dibandimbanaymuŋa baŋgul bayimbambu guniɲu.
The caterpillar is searching for the man that is always carrying stones.

note: The language belongs to the Pama–Nyungan family; it is a dying Australian Aboriginal language spoken in northeast Queensland.ŋ = ng in hang.ɲ ≈ ni in onion; ȷ is a stop (as d) articulated in the same place in the mouth as ɲ .A death adder is an Australian venomous snake. A wallaby is a small animal, related to kangaroo. A possum is an Australian arboreal marsupial. Stinging trees are a genus of shrubsand trees with stinging hairs, some of which are dangerous to humans.
